This is a post with executable code.

We can use Python.
```{python}
a = 10
b = a**2
```

We can use the result inside of a $\LaTeX$ snippet.

$$
\begin{aligned}
b & = a^2 \\
b & = `{python} b`
\end{aligned}
$$ 

Or in the main text: With $a = 10$ the value of $a^2$ is `{python} b`.
